Interface MembershipRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Membership, MembershipId>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Membership, MembershipId>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Membership, MembershipId>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Membership, MembershipId>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Membership, MembershipId>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Membership>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Membership, MembershipId>
@Repository public interface MembershipRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Membership, MembershipId>
Repository interface for Membership entity operations. Provides data access methods for Membership entities using Spring Data JPA with composite primary key support.

    • existsByOrgIdAndUserId

      boolean existsByOrgIdAndUserId(String orgId, String userId)
      Checks if a membership exists for the given organization and user.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      true if a membership exists, false otherwise

    • countActiveMembersByOrgId

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(m) FROM Membership m WHERE m.orgId = :orgId AND m.status = 'ACTIVE'") long countActiveMembersByOrgId(@Param("orgId") String orgId)
      Counts the number of active memberships for an organization.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      Returns:
      the count of active memberships

    • countMembershipsByUserId

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(m) FROM Membership m WHERE m.userId = :userId") long countMembershipsByUserId(@Param("userId") String userId)
      Counts the number of memberships for a user across all organizations.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      the count of memberships for the user
